616540.name: Fantasy Grounds - Greater Undead (Token Pack)
616540.description:
Greater Undead

This token pack contains 25 tokens. This pack contains A variety of undying antagonists.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 2 Bloody Knights
  • Bloody Skeleton
  • Death Knight
  • Ektoplasmic Druid
  • Feral Undead
  • Ghost Gnome
  • Hell Mare
  • Lich Lord
  • Ogre Ektoplasm
  • Ogre Skeleton
  • Phantom Armor
  • Skeletal Captain
  • Skeletal Guard
  • Skeleton, Four Armed
  • Undead Guardian
  • Undead Leader
  • Undead Oracle
  • Vampire
  • Vampire Female
  • Blood Pool
  • Bone Golem
  • Cyclops Zombie
  • Flame Drake
  • Skull Catapult
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
